thread.title: Denise
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Denise

author: Denise
title: Denise
text: Erik was great, very friendly. He explained everything very well. We had a bolt missing and I was able to run to the store to get one. Seem to have better quality made furniture at reasonable prices compared to some of the bigger named stores. Will definitely buy from them again.
